title: Myanmar needs to fix power supply and infrastructure to revive its tourism sector, says AMRO
description:
PHNOM PENH (Bernama): Struggling Myanmar welcomed about 800,000 tourists up to October this year, signalling the tourism sector's lacklustre growth as the country grapples with a plethora of challenges, from power supply issues to connectivity.

title: Finland to wind down embassies in Pakistan, Afghanistan, Myanmar by 2026
description:
Foreign Minister Elina Valtonen said the reforms reflect Finland’s need to adapt to shifting geopolitical realities.

Finland has begun formal preparations to close its embassies in Islamabad, Kabul and Yangon in 2026 as part of a major overhaul of its global diplomatic network, the Ministry for For...
